summary: Initial Internet Computer (Motoko + React) app scaffold with build/deploy templates, Internet Identity auth hooks, and a themed interactive frontend (hearts background, moving 'No' button, fireworks overlay) plus generated assets.

existing_features.title: IC project scaffold (Motoko backend + React frontend)
existing_features.description: Baseline project structure with Motoko canister, React/Vite frontend, config, build scripts, and deployment templates.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template for ICP (Dockerfile, scripts, canister YAMLs)
existing_features.description: Reusable build-template including Dockerfile, deploy.sh, icp.yaml, workspace/package configs, and canister configuration files.

existing_features.title: Frontend UI component library integration (shadcn/ui)
existing_features.description: shadcn/ui components and supporting frontend tooling/config (eslint rules, postcss, tailwind, tsconfig, vite).

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication hooks and actor wiring
existing_features.description: Frontend hooks/utilities to authenticate with Internet Identity and construct a backend actor client for canister calls.

existing_features.title: Themed interactive frontend (hearts background, moving No button, fireworks overlay)
existing_features.description: Custom interactive UI components including FloatingHeartsBackground, MovingNoButton, and FireworksOverlay integrated into the React app.

existing_features.title: Generated frontend asset pipeline and bundled generated image(s)
existing_features.description: Scripts for pruning/resizing images and inclusion of generated asset(s) under public/assets/generated.

existing_features.title: Expanded shadcn/ui component catalog included in template
existing_features.description: Build-template frontend now includes a broad set of shadcn/ui components (accordion, dialogs, forms, navigation, charts, etc.) along with related ESLint rules and utilities, providing a more complete out-of-the-box UI toolkit.

existing_features.title: GitHub export / ICP CLI-oriented project packaging support
existing_features.description: Project/build-template updated to support workflows oriented around exporting/packaging the project for GitHub usage with ICP CLI conventions (configs/scripts/templates updated accordingly).

existing_features.title: Fix the fireworks visibility so that after clicking the "YES" button, the fireworks are clearly visible (not tiny faint dots) across common desktop and mobile screens by correcting particle opacity/lifespan logic and increasing perceived brightness/size as needed.

Adjust the fireworks canvas rendering so it does not look like a solid black screen overlay; ensure the overlay remains visually transparent while still allowing trails/glow effects (if used), and keep the YES message and image readable beneath the fireworks.

Maintain smooth performance by keeping the existing mobile performance scaling behavior, and ensure the animation cleans up correctly when fireworks stop (no continuing intervals/animations after the 10-second celebration window).

new_feature_requests.summary: Improve YES-click fireworks celebration so fireworks are clearly visible (not tiny dots on black screen); increase size/brightness/density and overall visual impact.

architectural_notes: Frontend uses React + Vite + Tailwind with shadcn/ui component set.
Auth is via Internet Identity; frontend provides hooks to create an authenticated actor for the Motoko canister.
Build/deploy automation provided via build-template (Dockerfile, deploy.sh, icp.yaml, canister.yaml).
Includes image tooling scripts (resize/prune) and generated assets in public/.
Build-template frontend ships with an expanded pre-generated shadcn/ui component set and associated lint rules/utilities for quicker UI assembly.
Project/build-template updated to align with ICP CLI/GitHub export-oriented packaging conventions (configs/scripts adjusted).
known_issues: Fireworks overlay after tapping YES can appear as tiny dots on a black screen (too subtle/low visibility).

generatedImages.description: Generated background/hero image asset (couple hugging at sunset).

projectName: Make YES celebration fireworks clearly visible (fix tiny-dot/black-screen issue)
